params.data: data to make a delegatecall with
params.target: address of the contract to make a delegatecall to

increaseNonce(address).notice: Increase the nonce of a given "who" to a particular "where" entity.

isOptedIn(address,address).notice: Check if a given "who" is opted-in to a particular "where" entity.
